Title: Relates to exempting full time active duty military members from certain fees and vehicle registration requirements
Summary: Relates to exempting full time active duty military members from certain requirements regarding drivers' licenses, learners' permits, non-driver identification cards and the registration of motor vehicles and motorcycles.
LawCode: Add ยง251-a, amd ยง251, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to exempting full time active duty military members from certain fees and vehicle registration requirements
